# Contributing to adventjs-cli

Thank you for your interest in contributing to **adventjs-cli**! This document provides guidelines and instructions for contributing to the project.

## Getting Started

See the [README.md](../README.md) for setup and installation instructions.

## Development Workflow

1. Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix:
   ```bash
   git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name
   ```
2. Make your changes
3. Build and test your changes (see README.md for commands)
4. Commit your changes with clear messages:
   ```bash
   git commit -m "Description of your changes"
   ```
5. Push to your fork and open a pull request against the `development` branch

## Code Standards

- Follow the existing code style and conventions
- Add tests for new features
- Update documentation as needed
- Ensure all tests pass before submitting a PR (see README.md)

## Pull Request Process

- Describe the changes clearly in your PR description
- Reference any related issues
- Ensure all CI checks pass
- Request review from maintainers
- Be responsive to feedback

## Reporting Issues

When reporting bugs, please include:

- Clear description of the issue
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Environment details (OS, Node version, etc.)

## Questions?

Feel free to open an issue if you have questions or need clarification on anything.
